snippet: The Mannes Beethoven Institute offered two Beethoven trios along with George Walker’s “Lyric for Strings” and his Violin Sonata No. 2.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews concert of works by Beethoven and New Jersey-based composer George Walker, performed at Mannes College the New School for Music as part of Mannes Beethoven Institute series.
lead_paragraph: The Mannes Beethoven Institute offered two Beethoven trios along with George Walker’s “Lyric for Strings” and his Violin Sonata No. 2.

headline.main: Review: Pairing Beethoven With George Walker at Mannes College
